Congressional Reports: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

The Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, to which was referred the bill (S. 951) to commemorate the service of First Ladies Jacqueline Kennedy and Patricia Nixon to improving and maintaining the Executive Residence of the President and to authorize grants to the White House Endowment Fund in their memory to continue their work, having considered the same, reports favorably thereon with an amendment and an amendment to the title and recommends that the bill as amended do pass.
